name: SNK Arcade Classics Vol. 1
overview: 16 NEOGEO classic arcade hits: • Art of Fighting • Baseball Stars 2 • Burning Fight • Fatal Fury • KOF94 • Last resort • Magician Lord • Metal Slug • Neo Turf Masters • Samurai Shodown • Sengoku • Shock Troopers • Top Hunter • Super Sidekicks 3 • World Heroes • King of the Monsters
